text: Trump speaks with Justice Alito amid push to halt criminal sentencing  —  Alito spoke to Trump to recommend an ex-clerk for a job in his administration.  —  President-elect Donald Trump speaks during a news conference at Mar-a-Lago, Jan. 7, 2024, in Palm Beach, Fla.

Taking Trump's imperialist trolling seriously (for a moment)  —  We've come a long way from bringing down egg prices.  —  ∙ Paid  —  Speaking as someone who's been covering Trump for nine years now, paying attention to what he's doing instead of obsessing over what he's saying is generally a good rule of thumb.

Kremlin, on Trump remarks on Greenland and Canada, says Russia has Arctic interests  —  The Kremlin on Thursday said that Russia had strategic national interests in the Arctic when asked to comment on U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's remarks about acquiring Greenland, absorbing Canada and taking control of the Panama Canal.

Live updates Jimmy Carter's funeral to be held at Washington National Cathedral  —  Jimmy Carter will be honored in Washington one last time Thursday, with a state funeral for the former president before a flight back home to be buried.  Public visitation at the U.S. Capitol ended Wednesday morning.
